info.title: Road Traffic Accident Information

definition.title: Definition of a Road Traffic Accident
definition.description: An accident occurs if a mechanically propelled vehicle on a road or public place causes:
definition.point1: Injury to anyone except the driver.
definition.point2: Damage to another vehicle, specified animals (horse, cattle, ass, mule, sheep, pig, goat or dog), or property.

actions.title: Immediate Actions
actions.safety1: Move to a safe location if possible.
actions.safety2: Turn on hazard lights and vehicle lights at night.
actions.safety3: Place a warning triangle if safe to do so.
actions.call999: Dial 999 for police, fire, or ambulance if needed.

duties.title: Statutory Duties
duties.exchangeDetails: Exchange Details: Provide name, address, and vehicle registration to other parties.
duties.showInsurance: If injury occurs, show a valid insurance certificate.

reportToPolice.title: When to Report to Police
reportToPolice.report24Hours: Report to the police within 24 hours if you canâ€™t exchange details at the scene.
reportToPolice.reportAsap: Report as soon as possible; delays can lead to prosecution.

collectEvidence.title: Collect Evidence
collectEvidence.scene: Accident scene, road signs, and skid marks
collectEvidence.noLiability: Do not admit liability at the scene.

dashcam.title: In-Vehicle Cameras
dashcam.description: If using a dashcam, ensure footage is:
dashcam.showDetails: Shows time, date, and GPS location
dashcam.saveFootage: Save footage immediately to prevent overwriting.

movingVehicles.title: Moving Vehicles
movingVehicles.moveVehicles: Move vehicles off the road if possible, after taking photos.
movingVehicles.checkIssues: Check for fluid leaks, brake, and steering issues before continuing to drive.

info.footer: Following these steps ensures compliance with UK law and protects your legal and insurance rights.
